body: Hi Anders, In cases like this the test point ends up being behind the test surface after generating the test mesh. If you slightly increase distance from base surface it will resolve the problem. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/8W5ARlmXvRndrrHZO2pdurFCgJ*iZQYL0wRyncj5VRqdYfzd-RZTyBcZO4YEYLaDQq5Gke-SpYI0QMIFZJKPowz3WCOq1gCU/radiationAnalysisAcuteMeshFaces.png)
